level.heading: Entities required to designate and maintain registered agent.
level.text: The following shall designate and maintain a registered agent in the District:
A domestic limited liability partnership; and

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 deleted "that does not maintain a place of business in the District" following "partnership" in (2); and substituted "registered" for "qualified" in (3).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
